Room.Name: Trantori's Redwood
Room.ShortDescription: You are inside a hollow part of a giant redwood tree.
Room.LongDescription: there is hole leading out onto a large branch nearby, and ladder rungs are nailed to the inside of the huge trunk. They disappear into the dark as you look both up and down. Outside, you can see a staircase attached to the side of the tree, and it seems to spiral out of sight also. But at least its not dark out there.
